item.title: Sr. Developer - OMS & Market Data (redwood shores)
item.description:
Experience:
Skills Required:
- 3+ years experience in developing Windows VC++ programs for a commercial product
- Extensive experience in order management, routing, and matching implementation
- Extensive experience in buying power calculation, compliance validation, etc.
- Java programming skill a plus
- Experience with OOP and design patterns

Description:
Fortex, Inc. (www.Fortex.com) is an industry leading provider of real-time, mission-critical financial trading and exchange systems. Currently, the Fortex FX system handles up to $12 billions daily currency transactions and over 5 millions tickets a month with top 10 global market making banks. We are launching into a rapid growth phase. If you thrive on a fast-paced dynamic environment and want to make a significant impact on a pioneering product, this unique opportunity may be just right for you.

Job Description:
- Develop a next generation multi-asset Order Management System and Order Matching System
- Develop a first-of-its-kind intelligent router to trade FX with various global banks and currency trading ECN
- Develop advanced intelligent router to route equities/options/futures orders to all major exchanges and ECN
- Develop API and FIX gateway to support hedge funds/broker-dealers algorithmic trading through our Multibank Portal

To apply for this position, send your resume and cover letter to careers@Fortex.com with "Sr. Developer - OMS & Market Data" in the subject line. You may also apply for the same position in our New York office.
